short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension to send a request to an API on the local machine. This is an extension for checkapi.app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The website cannot provide the ability to send API requests to the local machine, but the checkapi.app application wants to give the user the ability to do so. So, here it is. Checkapi.app implements the Check API extension to send a request to the local machine API.
